movies.title: Black Friday
movies.plot: Bombs tear through Bombay, wreaking havoc and polarising the citizens. With perpetrators at large, the state launches a massive drive to unmask the truth behind these events.

events.title: Gul Mohammed confesses conspiracy to bomb several major targets
multiple bombs kill 257 people in Bombay
189 people are accused of being complicit in the Bombay bombings
